chapters.title: Chapter 50:  Choosing Enemies
chapters.info: Lord Bertome Saighan, p. 740—Short, ruggedly handsome lord of Cairhien with the front of his head shaved. He is Colavaere's cousin, and since her death has become High Seat of House Saighan. He is probably the most important Cairhinin noble who sides with Elayne. He is short, and mildly handsome. He accepts Rand in public, but criticizes him in private. See also Saighan, Colavaere.
